features: The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level.Use clearalif laundry softener sheets to reduce damage caused by fiber friction,Enhance softness.
Reduce harsh ingredients and use gentler bioenzyme-based materials for lower sensitivity.
No plastic pollution, rapid dissolution, and no residue.
Easier to use than traditional fabric softener , with no need for measuring and no mess.
During daily use, clothes rub against each other and cause static electricity, CLEARALIF softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance fragrance and softness The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level.Use clearalif laundry softener sheets to reduce damage caused by fiber friction,Enhance softness. Antistatic Property During daily use, clothes rub against each other and cause static electricity, CLEARALIF softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Fabric FIber Damage Protect Reduce fiber friction to reduce fiber damage and protect fiber color. Keep your clothes bright and colorful. Fight Static Electricity Fabric softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Travel laundry set Convenient for travel and compact in size, taking up minimal space in your luggage. No need for measuring No need to measure the dosage as it comes pre-cut. The laundry set is designed to provide up to 160 loads. No plastic pollution Utilize more green packaging materials and bioenzyme cleaning agents. A good gift idea It is a perfect gift that adds creativity to a green lifestyle.

Why choose CLEARALIF laundry sheets? Developing green and useful products is what we are going after. Plastic and chemical pollution are serious problems that concern us all.We use green ingredients such as surfactants and enzymes to prevent chemical pollution.We employ decomposable packaging to combat plastic consumption.With compression technology, we removed the liquid in our products and made them more portable, which enables us to simplify packaging. Therefore, we can transport more goods at one time to save fuel and reduce carbon emission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are always looking for ways to reduce waste and plastic, so I was happy to try out these dissolvable fabric softener sheets. We already use dissolvable detergent sheets so we're familiar with the concept.I have used these both by tossing in with the laundry and by tucking into the softener dispenser in our washing machine and have had similar success either way.I don't notice a strong scent on these but it might be canceled out by the scent beads I also use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They work well. The scent in the box is very, very strong! Luckily it isn’t that strong after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fabric softener sheets work well. I've been using 2 sheets for large loads. They do help make the clothes softer, with just a bit of scent, nothing overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Softener sheets for the washer
reviews.reviewText: Finally!!! I was wondering when they would come out with fabric softener sheets for the washer. I've been using laundry detergent sheets for months, and I love that I no longer have to store those big plastic jugs. Now I can get rid of the liquid softener jugs. If you're limited on storage space like I am, this is a huge deal.No more measuring either. Just pop them in at the same time you put in the detergent sheets, and forget about it. These sheets are lightly scented, but it wasn't noticeable when taking the clothes out of the washer. The clothes were static free when they came out of the dryer, but I will note that I also use wool dryer balls to speed the drying process and they also help with static control.These sheets, just like the detergent sheets, are perfect for travel. If you live in a dorm or apartment, or if you take your laundry to a laundromat, you will lighten your load by not having to lug around those big jugs. I'm excited to have found these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They smell bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use in the Washer, not Dryer!
reviews.reviewText: I love using fabric softener sheets in the dryer because they leave a great smell once done, but I was surprised these were using alongside my laundry detergent! I don't know if they do much in terms of making my clothes softer, but it does make it smell great. I try to use these weekly or every two weeks because using them for too long may cause the clothes to not wash well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept for the laundry sheets. More eco friendly, no measuring, takes up less space. A lot of positives! I have tried multiple laundry detergent sheets, but this is the first softener sheets I've used but the seconds scent. I think this one has a more pronounced scent than the other that I've used. I like the these and the ease of using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars clothes come out softer
reviews.reviewText: I don't normally use fabric softener, but since I switched from liquid/pod laundry detergent to laundry sheets, I decided to give fabric softener sheets a try.Tip: These sheets GO IN THE WASH not in the dryer!Once dried, I noticed the clothes washed with one of these sheets in the drum as well were softer than those only washed with detergent.Lightly scented.Non-messy, compact, it's a win!
